title: Verify account gets deactivated with 5 violation points
custom_preconds:
New logic: https://github.com/company/repo/pull/8765
* Regular workers: 8 points threshold for deactivation
* New Pro workers: 3.5 points threshold for deactivation



Config: NEW_WORKER_SHIFT_THRESHOLD set to 2

custom_steps_separated.content: Login as a newly sign up pro
Have the new pro book 2 shifts

Have the pro no show (or late cancel) the first shift (violation point 4)
- No-show: A pro who was attached to a shift, but failed to show up for the gig.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro's account should be suspended for 1 day + removed from future shifts

custom_steps_separated.content: Once pro is able to book shifts, have Pro book 2 shifts

Have Pro late cancel the shift (violation point 1) so the total violation points is > 4.5
- Late Cancellation: A pro who was attached to a shift, but cancelled close to the start time of the gig.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro's account should be deactivated + removed from future shifts

custom_steps_separated.content: Relaunch the app and see the Open shifts screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Open shift screen should indicate the account is now deactivated with a "No-show" card and its corresponding shift details.
